in the world right now so this is the
place to be

pretty much every nation that wants to
go to the Olympics is here with their

showing of the best riders of the world
snowboarding is very much a community
there's a lot of camaraderie no matter
what country you're from so there's a

right before the Olympic season there is
much more intensity in the air than
usual

I think the biggest thing for the US

that we prioritize fun you know that's
